translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 整えつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were in the process of organizing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「徴兵だって！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Conscription!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争は終わったんじゃなかったのかよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wasn't the war over?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、今度は儂らのような者までか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This time, even people like us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺は良いぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm fine with it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物どもの本拠地にいって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go to the monsters' stronghold,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一発殴ってやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and punch them once!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、私も！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I will too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、魔物に怯えるのはうんざりよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sick of being scared of monsters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一発ひっぱたいてやるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll slap them one good time!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう！　今回は防衛ではなく、攻勢！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right! This time, it's not defense, but offense!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に攻めこむ兵を募集する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're recruiting soldiers to invade the demon army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行き先は――――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The destination is――――!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「進め！　進め！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Advance! Advance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「進め！　進め！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Advance! Advance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「進め進め進め！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Advance, advance, advance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集結する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人と魔の境目…………人の世界の、果てへ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the boundary between humans and demons... to the edge of the human world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地から、20万の兵力が追加された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An additional 200,000 troops were gathered from various regions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の砦―――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rear guard fortress―――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーー……寒い寒い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaah... so cold, so cold...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人が住む所じゃないわー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't a place where people should live."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防寒コートを纏ったリアが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, clad in a thermal coat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁっ、と両手に息を吹きかけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exhaled into her cupped hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、背後。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Behind her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍であることを示す、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was a massive, colorful army indicating it was the Leazas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夥しい数の、色彩豊かな兵団が揃っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge number of richly colored battalions were assembled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様。バレス将軍が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Ria. General Bares has..."
"Hmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス軍、整いましてございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Leazas army is fully organized."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつにもまして引き締まった表情で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With an expression more tense than usual,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒の老将と謳われた大将軍が、王に膝をつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the great general praised as the Black Old Commander knelt before the king.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒の軍、赤の軍、青の軍、白の軍、紫の軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Black army, Red army, Blue army, White army, and Purple army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て、いつでも出撃可能にございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are all ready to deploy at any time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完璧？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perfect?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「滞りなく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Without any problems."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。ご苦労さま」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good. Thank you for your hard work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……色々感慨深いもんだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's quite sentimental.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンとリーザスが、同じ方を向いてやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hermann and Leazas are looking in the same direction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... that's true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回とも、また少し違います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's also a bit different from last time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よう、死神。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Reaper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせなら、首の数で競争するか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we're at it, want to compete over how many heads we get?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………遠慮しておきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'll pass on that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数えきれるか、自分には自信がないので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not confident I could even keep count."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そらぁ、そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah, that's probably for the best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……あの黒騎士の偉容。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... the majesty of that Black Knight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見る度に、落ち着かなくなるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every time I see him, I get uneasy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後ろから襲われるかも、って？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you worried he might attack from behind?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、確か5軍の……いや、そうではないが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, he is definitely from the Fifth army... or no, that's not it."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we're at it, want to compete over how many heads we get?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………遠慮しておきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'll pass on that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数えきれるか、自分には自信がないので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not confident I could even keep count."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そらぁ、そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah, that's probably for the best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……あの黒騎士の偉容。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... the majesty of that Black Knight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見る度に、落ち着かなくなるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every time I see him, I get uneasy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後ろから襲われるかも、って？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you worried he might attack from behind?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、確か5軍の……いや、そうではないが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, he is definitely from the Fifth army... or no, that's not it."
